Instruction: In a medium bowl, soak the bread slices in milk for about 10 minutes or until softened.
Place the potatoes in a single layer on the ungreased baking sheet.

Broil the potatoes in the preheated oven until they begin to brown, approximately 7 minutes. Take them out of the oven and turn the potatoes over. Put them back in the oven and keep broiling until they are golden brown, for about another 5 minutes.
Coconut oil can be used in place of canola oil if desired.
